snippet.title: #WarOnTerrier: Johnny Depp’s dogs given 72 hours to live by Australian authorities - TomoNews
snippet.description:
Johnny Depp is in trouble with the authorities in Australia after he and his wife Amber Heard smuggled their dogs into the country via their private jet without declaring them to customs.

Australian authorities were alerted to the presence of the Yorkshire terriers — Pistol and Boo — after Depp had them taken to a Gold Coast pet salon. Agricultural Minister Barnaby Joyce gave Depp and Heard 72 hours to have their dogs flown back to the U.S. or said they would be put to sleep.

Depp, who is currently filming the fifth installment of Pirates of the Caribbean, declined to comment. Filming was disrupted in March when Depp accidentally slashed his hand open on a glass door, requiring him to return to the U.S. for surgery.
